API.Description: Gets all competitors and their social media ids.
Gets a competitor by id and their social media ids.
Gets all crunchbase entries.
Gets a specific crunchbase entry.
Creates the company object from the JSON page value and inserts into the database.
Get specific number of portfolio domains for processing
Get specific number of domains for processing by bitmask
Creates the domain object from the JSON page value and inserts into the database.
Gets all information for facebook pages we collect. GoDaddy's page as well as competitors.
Gets information for a specific facebook account.
Creates a facebook page object from the JSON page value and inserts into the database.
Creates a facebook country demographic object from the JSON page value and inserts into the database.
Gets all marketshare information we collect.
Gets all marketshare information we collect by page.
Gets all marketshare information for a specific domain.
Creates a marketshare record from the JSON page value and inserts into the database.
Gets all portfolio domain information we collect.
Gets all information we collect for portfolio domains by page.
Gets all information for a specific shopper in the GoDaddy portfolio.
Gets all information for a specific domain in the GoDaddy portfolio.
Creates a portfolio domain record from the JSON page value and inserts into the database.
Gets all twitter mentions for GoDaddy.
Gets all twitter mentions for GoDaddy by page.
Gets GoDaddy twitter mention by id.
Gets the list of keywords we are searching twitter for.
Creates a twitter mentions record from the JSON page value and inserts into the database.
Creates twitter user records from the JSON list page value and inserts into the database.
API.Usage:
http://localhost/bidata/api/twitter/users

API.Description: Gets YouTube video by video id.
